info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 24 at 7:41PM MDT until June 24 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
FFWEPZ
The National Weather Service in El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... The Trout Fire Burn Scar in... Northeastern Grant County in southwestern New Mexico...
* Until 900 PM MDT.
* At 741 PM MDT, Rain has moved out of the Trout Fire burn scar area, but runoff may still contribute to flooding of canyons that flow into the Upper Mimbres River for another hour or so. Increased water flows are also likely to travel down the Mimbres River. The flood risk has diminished for the Upper Sapillo Creek basin.
Heavy rainfall may also be causing flooding of arroyos and low water crossings along Highway 35 near San Juan and Sherman, though unrelated to the Trout Fire.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Trout Fire Burn Scar.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Trout Fire Burn Scar.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... San Lorenzo, Sherman, Mimbres, San Juan and Upper Mimbres Valley.
info.instruction: This is a life threatening situation. Heavy rainfall will cause extensive and severe flash flooding of creeks...streams...and ditches in the Trout Fire Burn Scar. Severe debris flows can also be anticipated across roads. Roads and driveways may be washed away in places. If you encounter flood waters...climb to safety.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 9:00 PM MDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 9:00 PM MDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 9:00 PM MDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 9:00 PM MDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
